author: VinInn
body:
This Pull Request adds to TrackBase the identifier of the algorithm where a track was first found.
This information is required to properly compute tracking efficiency using tag&probe methods
(cfr comments by Paris at the physics plenary on 7/5/2015).

No regression expected, no regression observed.

backport to 7_4_X is requested.
title: add the identifier of the algorithm where the track was first found
